name: Rolling Ball (MCrafterzz)
description:
A small work in progress 3D platformer. Complete 5 levels with different obstacles and challenges. The game uses a simplistic low poly style.

Controls:

W - accelerate

S - brake

A - turn left (only when moving)

D - turn right (only when moving)

R - reset level

Esc - return to level select (only after completing all levels)

Planned features:

- More levels (with new obstacles)

- Sounds (+music?)
